__e: He told me all about him when he came to see me.
I used to be the guy you came and talked to, remember?
Make me. When I first came here to see you, you asked me if you were in my dreams.
You know, when I came here, the time was ten minutes after six, and now...
When I got here she was already dead.
And as for my coming here with all this on me at yours and the others' first sight of it, I had the upper hand.
